given format style, keeping the text up to date as time progresses.

abstract.text: Declare the user interface and behavior for your app on every platform.
The key used to look up an entry in a strings file or strings dictionary
file.

while it’s being built, for use in creating a localized string key.

supported by a corresponding format style.

A view that displays one or more lines of read-only text.
A source of time related data.
A type that converts a given data type into a representation in another type, such as a string.
The type this format style accepts as input.
The type this format style produces as output.
A value type for a string with associated attributes for portions of its text.
A type that can be compared for value equality.
A Unicode string value that is a collection of characters.
